item.title: Policeman who raped female colleague named
item.description:
A police officer found guilty of raping a colleague at a Northland motel can now be named after he abandoned his bid for secrecy.
Jamie Foster was on trial for two weeks last month before a jury found ...

item.title: Light plane crash in remote Wairarapa farming area
item.description:
A light aircraft has crashed in Wairarapa.
Emergency services were called to the crash near Carterton about 7.30am.
Police said the plane crashed near Ruakiwi Rd, Kourarau Hill.
The incident happened ...
